website_summaries.verdict: This is a popular choice among hobby welders who don't need the most advanced features. The headgear is comfortable and eyewear comes with extra lenses.
pros: Works especially well in grind mode
Darkest setting (13) reduces retinal burn from arc light but not overall visibility
cons: Ventilation an issue during hot conditions

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and functions flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: I am a lead at a machine/weld shop. I fill in for my my welding crew when a member of the team can't seem to get their big fat ego out of bed. I mig, pulse mig and tig anywhere from 1 to 70 hours a week. I love the fit. Everything functions as it should. I'd buy it again...hopefully several years down the road. Note to potential buyer: put this item in your cart and watch the price for a week. It was going up and down about once a day. I was going to buy it for $265. I ended up getting it for 230
customer_reviews.author: Yaki nworb

customer_reviews.title: Better than all the rest
customer_reviews.text: I have been welding for over 30 years and a long-time fan of the fixed-shade gold filters. No auto-darkening lens ever came close to seeing the action of the weld puddle, until this. It shows color variation, clarity, and the ability to see into the puddle much better than any helmet I have used, including gold filters. The wide field of view is a huge asset and it is light weight. It was worth every penny. It is also durable. A coworker dropped a large section of steel on my helmet, but the hood flexed with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: sparky

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely the best helmet I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best helmet I have ever used. Incredibly clear in inactive state, or active state. All my co workers use Miller elite and Miller infinity series hoods, and a few use speed glass. None of them hold a candle to this one. I weld straight for 10 hours a day and this thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best hood out there
customer_reviews.text: I'm a boilermaker and weld nearly everyday at work. I work with guys who have been in for 20 plus years and they all agree that this is the clearest lens out there. Its lightweight and comfortable. The weld is insanely clear and has some shades of white, blues and purple. I can't get over it. The grind setting is light enough you can actually use it and see what you are doing. People on my job are buying them up.
customer_reviews.author: Redkelso

customer_reviews.title: Get this one
customer_reviews.text: This is the helmet you are looking for! The view through this is UNBELIEVABLY clear! The controls are simple and address all welder's needs. I used to use a Miller Digital Elite and I absolutely loved it but one look through this new welding helmet and I was sold. Simply put you can see better and if you can see better you can weld better. Everyone in my welding shop as either gone to this or is anxiously waiting for the day when they can buy this! Way to go Lincoln!
customer_reviews.author: nest builder

customer_reviews.title: Best hood I have used!
customer_reviews.text: I had an Optrel hood that I thought was phenomenal. Having used this I can 'see' that I was wrong! This has to be the best hood I have ever used since I began welding 40+ years ago. Definitely worth the money when you compare it to the others on the market. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KHWMI

customer_reviews.title: big mistake this helmet is like seeing after being blind compared to that
customer_reviews.text: I got a cheap Hobart at first...........big mistake this helmet is like seeing after being blind compared to that!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Shofner

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet but Beware.
customer_reviews.text: I love this helmet. Best (and most expensive) I have ever used. So why just 4 stars? After receiving the helmet I ordered replacement inside and outside lens protectors. After using the helmet a few days I went to replace both lens and discovered the inner lens had never been installed. So now the actual darking modules is all pitted up. I called the manufacturer for assistance. The guy was super nice. He directed me to a local AirGas supply location that sells Lincoln products. There store manager called same Lincoln person I spoke with and they sent a replacement module to the AirGas store.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Best functionality on the market
customer_reviews.text: I just started TIG welding and wanted something to help with the learning curve and this helmet does just that. Beautiful clarity, good fit and very functional. Headgear works fine and is comfortable, however, I can see how someone with a large forehead may experience pinching around the temple region. If you're worried about flash then use a flashlight to test it before each use (or use the test button). I prefer the manual test with a light.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity63

customer_reviews.title: Good Helmet but has a defective lens
customer_reviews.text: Works great but my biggest complaint is there is some kind of short in the auto darkening lens that has made me go through 3 batteries in 2 months. Each battery is suppose to last 2,000 hours. I can guarantee I have about 10 percent of that usage in all! Good helmet and wish the company would send a replacement so there is no lapse since I need to continue to use a helmet each day. (Having problems contacting the company).
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J

customer_reviews.title: Screens break pretty easy
customer_reviews.text: This hood is amazing, unfortunately the screen broke after it fell off my head onto the table (about 2 feet). I'm not very hard on my stuff either. It might not be a big deal but this is the 2nd Viking hood I have purchased and the screen has broke in less than 6 months. The replacement screens cost more than the hood alone! If you want an amazing hood for less than a few months this is the hood for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Fleury

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: When it welds it’s awesome but that’s the issue i depend on my helmet for my job and I can recall at least 4 instances when the helmet just stopped working for about a week somehow it fixes itself and worked again but still it’s a steep price to pay for a unreliable hood. Ive only had it a little over a year and wouldn’t recommend it just based on the reliability issues. I would go for a digital elite or something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Roll of the dice?
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great hood but won’t hold up. Mine started to eat up batteries after five months of use. I have to change the battery every five days now. Like the solar panel isn’t doing this job so the battery gets drained. I’m not sure. . Typical of auto darks when they are on their way to the grave. Happened to my Jackson NexGen after four years. Like I said sharp hood ,easy to find cheaper lens that fit the outside (big plus) but doesn’t seem to hold up well and I took good care of it.however it was sent in for warranty repairs free of charge. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Night and Day
customer_reviews.text: Huge field of view, fast acting, comfortable, and the shade is very light when not active. My history has been with helmets in a much lower price range and the improvement in my ability to see the weld (and the set-up) in this helmet is incredible. Novices should start with a helmet of this caliber to improve the quality and reduce their frustration.
customer_reviews.author: CFS

customer_reviews.title: I'll never go back, would purchase again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is a little pricey, but I could never go back to my old helmet, it has a huge viewing window and is easy to see your project when not striking an arc! Highly recommended! Great product, I dont even know how it could be improved to be honest and I am an aluminum fabricator for a living, I can wear this helmet for hours on end at work without a problem, very comfortable. I bought 1 for work and had to buy 1 for home after using it for 2 years, only changed the battery once in that 2 year period with 5 days a week use.
customer_reviews.author: Gregur

customer_reviews.title: Best hood I've used
customer_reviews.text: Best hood I've used. Lowest priced hood for viewing area. Finger controls for quick changes. Easiest screen replacement of all the hoods I've used. Shades 5-14. This is a $500 hood if it was miller or speedglass.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: My opinion
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, it's an amazing welding helmet, it has an incredible clear vision , large view and a comfort headgear ( you should optimize it), if I can give it an extra star, I'll do, after I try it ican say without confusing it worth every dollar I paid for it, the shipping was fast and the package wasn't damaged, at the end I will say that I am satisfied with this awesome product 😁
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed s.

customer_reviews.title: Best 'Top of the Line' Helmet, Much less than 3M, Miller, Optrel, etc
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this at $245. We have a Miller Digital Infinity and Speedglass. Viking 3350 has better clarity and easier to use buttons/dials even with gloves on. Also, 3350 uses standard exterior and interior screens, making super easy to pick up at your local welding supply, not to mention it ships with several replacements. I'm still using the original pack that came with. Very light, but very sturdy; I can work back and forth with this helmet on and almost forget I'm wearing it. I'm pleased with the 3350's construction and performance and I'm picky AF.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Better viewing through the lens on this welding helmet.
customer_reviews.text: This welding helmet is much better than the original one I got from Harbor Freight.. It cost about 6 times more than the Harbor Freight helmet, but it does work better, and I can see with much more clarity and detail when welding..
customer_reviews.author: Hovey Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Big difference from my older, import hood.
customer_reviews.text: This was a sort of impulse splurge for me. I had a functioning one from a popular import company, but I thought a good one might help me see the weld better. That was an understatement. This one not only fits a ton better, but the window's a lot bigger and it is SO much clearer when not darkened. Really clear and clean when not darkened. Dandy when darkened as well.
customer_reviews.author: picklecolor2

customer_reviews.title: Love this helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st automatic helmet I've used. The viewing area was always too small. The 1st time I used it. All I could say was, wow. Very surprised. I love everything about this helmet. Although there's plenty of room under the helmet for eye glasses. There's also built in clips for magnifier lenses. Very much appreciated. I've used it for awhile now and cant get used to not having to flip the helmet between welds. I'll definitely buy the upgraded version in the distant future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Messed up after 6-months of use
customer_reviews.text: After only 6-months of light use, this hood is having issues. I did like it, until the auto-dark began flickering during use, in-turn flashing me really badly. Tried replacing the battery, but had the same results. Fortunately had my old Miller hood to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shadrack W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Not as "pretty" as the other air brushed helmets, but this thing does it's job very well. I've put countless hours on it since the purchase June 2017 and I've never been flashed, no battery replacement, and it's extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Tichelaar

customer_reviews.title: Love the darkening.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Just wish it was longer in the front. I have to put a leather bib on it to keep my neck from burning. Which means drilling holes in it. The clip on bibs don't work.
customer_reviews.author: love2read

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for TIG and so much better than the cheap Chinese helmets!
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason this helmet is 5 times more than the Chinese helmets. The clarity on this helmet is astounding. I can see so much more clearly and I can see things I could never see with my cheap Antra helmet. I should have bought this helmet first!
customer_reviews.author: RegularUser

customer_reviews.title: They got it right!
customer_reviews.text: Head gear took some getting used to. I am old school always used old school regular hoods. This is the best as far as color and clearity. I would recommend to anyone who is a seasoned welder. Rookies need to use a old flip lid to really appreciate it. Will never go with out this hood, but still carry old faithful.
customer_reviews.author: robert bergquist

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, simply amazing view. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing difference from the cheapo auto darkening. Get out from behind that green fog and actually SEE what your weld looks like. It really is like welding for the first time. It's a little heavy, and the head gear takes time to set up for your head. Very flexible fit for all head sizes and shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Just Ducky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best hood I've used. Headgear is comfortable, nice big view. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob halliday

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much top of the line helmet. Treated me well through welding school and in my current job MIG welding stainless. I switched from a cheap auto darkening helmet and the difference is night and day. The welding arc is much more clear through this helmet and I can see much more of the joint around the weld. Also the head straps are adjustable and after getting them set right the helmet is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet, Lincoln customer service sucks
customer_reviews.text: I tried to register this helmet. Online. The form assumes you are registering a welder. I didn't buy a F'n welder! So contacted "Chat" they gave me a phone number. Called and they said we don't register helmets.......nice. Last time I checked this is 2019 and this stuff should be simple. Shame on Lincoln. Seller did great. 2 stars is all I'll give given the manufacturers lack of support.
customer_reviews.author: R. Selberg

customer_reviews.title: This helmet is awesome and I'm glad I took the plunge
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional welder.I was having trouble seeing the joint and the puddle,even with reading glasses. I have two $50.00 auto darkening helmets , and several others that aren't.This helmet is awesome and I'm glad I took the plunge!
customer_reviews.author: nason13

customer_reviews.title: Great and affordable eye protection for the small shop or hobby user
customer_reviews.text: Better price than a local welding supply and it comes from a welding supply shop at a bargain price. You could pay a lot more, but your eyes deserve the protection this provides ... and the price is hard to ignore.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Clark, PMP

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good price! I went to two local welding shops, picking up gas, and checked the price of this helmet. They both wanted well over 300 for it and were surprised that it was so cheap on amazon. They wouldn’t even price match. It also works really well. I got it to replace a Miller and I like it MUCH more.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Can Everything be this Good?
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is an amazing piece of equipment. I regret nothing about this purchase. It definitely costs more than some hoods, but the perks (light-weight, viewing area, technology, ease-of-use etc.) totally off-set any bad thoughts about spending this much money. I would recommend this product to anyone who is going to do more than a weekend of welding. Also, I have no complaints about the seller, Baker's Gas & Welding Supplies, everything was included in the shipment. It came on-time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Adjustments let you change the settings. Very clear view when welding. Had a cheap auto darkening helmet before, but eye doctor noticed spots in the back of my eyes that he said are typically from welding. Buy a good helmet like this right away; you only have one set of eyes.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Great Welding Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice helmet. The auto darkening feature works great and it is adjustable. The window is very large and does not limit your view. The helmet fits snugly and stays in place. There really is nothing not to like. Be careful with the auto darkening adjustment, you can set this helmet to allow too much light through.
customer_reviews.author: Linus and Luna of Santa Cruz, CA

customer_reviews.title: Works well but expensive and fragile
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful with it. My lens cracked when it dropped from waste high.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility
customer_reviews.text: Best welding helmet I've ever used. Clarity under the arc is amazing. The headgear is extremely comfortable. It is lightweight as well. I have a Miller digital elite as well, and I much prefer the Lincoln.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing view and color is even better than non-auto gold screens
customer_reviews.text: This is the clearest, most naturally colored view of any helmet I've ever seen. If I were a serious welder, I would have kept it. Since I'm obviously not a serious welder, I sent this one back and kept the Blue-point (Snap-on) helmet that was not as color correct, but rather more comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: rcb

customer_reviews.title: Great value and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Amazon (U.S) had the best price in the web. The helmut is very well made,light to wear..and a very comfortable strap system to say on your head. Adjustments for the lense are easy and accurate. Would strongly recommend for the added cost to professional welder.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Ponzo

customer_reviews.title: Best Helmet I've Used!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using welding helmets for 30 years and this is by far the best I've ever used! Extremely comfortable and extremely clear.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I replaced my older welding helmet with this one and ...
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my older welding helmet with this one and what a difference. I can see clearer now at the pool and weld line. if it worth the money. we were welding some home décor stuff and I let my friend use mine and he is going to buy one after seeing the difference.
customer_reviews.author: canuk

customer_reviews.title: its a winner!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice welding helmet. Definitely improved my welding. I can see and control the puddle better than before, I've got old eyes so I'll probably need a cheater lens
customer_reviews.author: Rocketman

customer_reviews.title: Bright view of your weld.
customer_reviews.text: Significant improvement over my old helmet. A lot brighter view than the my Hobart. The viewing window is larger than I need, but the sale price put it inline with the equivalent smaller viewed product..
customer_reviews.author: RedAnt

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best welding hood I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best welding hood I have ever had. It work's Great dont wast your money on some of the cheaper hood that do not work well take care of your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: This is my second helmet like this one
customer_reviews.text: This is my second helmet like this one. Someone stole the last one because it was so good. I looked at others, even more expensive ones, but this helmet offer adjust-ability, a wide viewing area and visibility in use which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk J.

customer_reviews.title: My first hood ever. I love it
customer_reviews.text: I've never welded 3 months ago. However, I was super interested in learning to so I decided to go into welding engineering for college. Needed a hood. Bought this one. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Conway

customer_reviews.title: Great welding helmet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a welding class at a local tech college. I had never used an auto-darkening helmet. This worked great. Plenty of field of view, light weight, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mcfarland

customer_reviews.title: I CAN SEE!
customer_reviews.text: As a new welder I thought the cheap helmet I bought with my Millermatic 211 was, you know "good enough." Turns out it wasn't - that faint green glow in the distance was the weld puddle all right, but how am I supposed to navigate? By the stars? But with new helmet, the 3350 - I can see! See the puddle, see the surrounding joint, see where I'm going. As I get better at this stuff I'll probably start noticing things like puddle color and my lame attempts at dime stacking...
customer_reviews.author: Taken Barstools

customer_reviews.title: This is the best welding helmet I've ever used. So worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Trust me. Just buy this thing and stop worrying about the other helmets you've got. This thing has a large viewing area, works perfectly in just about every way I've could imagine.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Welding Helmet worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing clarity and color with this mask. I own several other more expensive masks. But I find myself reaching for this one because of the clarity.
customer_reviews.author: J. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great, but check out newer version.
customer_reviews.text: Newer version (4) available with newer technology, more features and $50 cheaper, otherwise a good helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: I can see very well with this helmet but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I can see very well with this helmet but the head band does not match the quality of the helmet it self
customer_reviews.author: S. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet, comfort fit
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, comfort fit, see what your doing, my only gripe would be - it would be nice to have an auto grind setting or a quick access grind button.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Super good
customer_reviews.text: I'm no professional but this is the best welding helmet I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This is like a new world of welding
customer_reviews.text: I could never justify the cost and now I regret never having one. This thing is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: K. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet
customer_reviews.text: These helmets seem to eat batteries and wear out relatively quickly this is my fourth helmet but quality and price meet
customer_reviews.author: Garritt

customer_reviews.title: An investment in protecting your eyes and quality welding
customer_reviews.text: This is a great helmet, love the grinding setting which protects not only your eyes but your face as well. Darkens quickly, great visibility before darkening and when dark
customer_reviews.author: Proud American

customer_reviews.title: Nice hood for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The headgear took a little getting used to and still slips a bit when you flip it up. Great viewing area. I will buy this again when I need another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this helmet
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet. Accidentally dropped it in the lake while working on a boat dock. Took the lens system out and put it in rice and worked again the next day. Best helmet I’ve ever used, just don’t risk it near water.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Graham

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet I’ve had by far
customer_reviews.text: Best helmet I’ve had by far. Comfortable rigging and great lenses, beautiful sight picture. Came with extra lense covers, a nice carry pouch, a hanky, and the usual sticker bling. 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I havent used it yet but just looking through it st home it seems way better then my bosses miller digital elite which cost him $120 more then this helmet and half the screen size.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Smith

customer_reviews.title: Clearest view for way less than $500!
customer_reviews.text: Clearest view I’ve ever had while welding, regardless of shade. Shape of the hood doesn’t trap my breath as bad as my other hoods, so it doesn’t fog up as bad. A little heavier than I’d like, but the size of the viewing area more than makes up for it. All in all, best welding hood I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S. Mabile

customer_reviews.title: Boss hood
customer_reviews.text: The 4C lens is amazing. Best clarity I've ever had in a hood. Speedglass sucks by comparison. Only issue is the cosmetics and maybe if like a slightly wider lens but those aren't really made so ill deal
customer_reviews.author: Megadime

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely works great. It is now the #1 helmet fought over at the job site. Lol. Gives very clear viewing while welding.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Super helmet!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this helmet. After 2 classes using school provided helmets and damaging my eye both times, I decided I didn't want to go blind. With this helmet I can actually SEE the weld puddle and the joint. Life just got a whole lot easier. Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money this shield cost you would think it would last longer then a year. My cheap $50 welding shield lasted longer. Would not recommend purchasing this product unless you want to purchase another one in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Rometa T. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Super clear
customer_reviews.text: Do your self a favor and buy it! This hood is amazing! You will not be disappointed. I was skeptical of how clear it would be, when I started lookin at it. every picture and video I’ve seen does it no justice for how clear it truly is.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Wide view, lots of settings! Comfortable and long battery life. Have used it for years now.
customer_reviews.author: Nick kalinowski

customer_reviews.title: best bet for the money
customer_reviews.text: not quite sure about the head support system, a bit heavy on the forehead, but the quality of the helmet is fantastic.( update) Have used it for a year now and really love the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Redwine

customer_reviews.title: Superb Clarity
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I've been using cheap helmets in class. I can't believe how much I was missing. The 4c clarity is amazing. Well done Lincoln, well done.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Siu

customer_reviews.title: Great welding hood!
customer_reviews.text: Clear view, light weight, all your adjustments are inside so you don't accidentally change your settings with an outside nob. I love this sheild and the 4c is definitely an upgrade on the lens, looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nowhere

customer_reviews.title: First auto dimming helmet - spoiled for life now.
customer_reviews.text: Large viewing window and lightweight. I'm not a pro but I bought this after receiving a recommendation for it from a local weld shop clerk and then looking at reviews from those that use it every day. They knew what they were talking about. Awesome helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Match ability to see work with sight protection and there is no need to go any further
customer_reviews.author: mikey

customer_reviews.title: Good viewing area
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Good viewing area. Responsive self darkening lense. Highly adjustable head gear. It's a little heavy and fits very tight with a 3M respirator with vapor filters on, but does its job. It is pricey but I say get the best tools out there and never look back. I'm a sculptor and this is more than enough for my uses.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I get this earlier?
customer_reviews.text: I just learned why I stunk at welding, I didn't have this helmet. Wow what a difference, no flashing while TIG welding like the cheap auto darkening helmets I was using before. Everything is so clear. Why didn't I get this earlier?
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Megargel

customer_reviews.title: Works with inverter machines.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! More comfortable than I could have imagined. Super clear vision. Works well with inverter tig machine no more flashing my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but if any slang burns through the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but if any slang burns through the protective lens it'll almost certainly fry the solar panels since they're at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Morty

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet i have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Switched from a hobart helmet to this one, it was a night and day difference, the lincoln is so much clearer and has a larger viewing area.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler S.

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last my husband a week!!! Big waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Savanah

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love the 4c lense. Hands down best shield I've ever owned, better than the miller elite.
customer_reviews.author: VikingzBeard

customer_reviews.title: I can see the puddle!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hood! Great clarity and colors are visible just as others have mentioned in reviews. Well worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I've been using the wrong helmets for way to long. This one is great! I can see very well at all times. I often worried that the battery might lose its charge in previous helmets and I wouldn't know early enough. This one has a battery indicator light. It also has a test button and a wide range of settings. I would highly recommend this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing clarity
customer_reviews.text: Very clear. Viewing area is large enough so I can use the close up lenses in my bifocals. Quite comfortable also.
customer_reviews.author: Lee G

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best welding hood I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have been a pipe welder for 25 yrs. This is by far the best welding hood I have ever owned. Very Happy.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for $50 less than the other makers. Sits perfect on my head and its pretty light. Completely satisfied with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Sands

customer_reviews.title: Amazing helmet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this helmet, great clarity. I'd give 10 stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: scampbell56068

customer_reviews.title: A great tool for your eyes
customer_reviews.text: This is clearer than all the other welding helmets I have. No more straining my eyes and I trust my eyes to those that know the business of welding technologies. I could see the weld puddle, the toes of the weld clearer and no more green vision. It's super awesome. It enhanced my welding to a new level.
customer_reviews.author: Hatchet Lake

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. I borrowed it to use for a TIG class and really liked it. I will likely buy one for myself too.
customer_reviews.author: REG53

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The 4c lens technology alows me to see where I’m heading and not just my weld pool .
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Used many shields, the clarity on this one is incredible!
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet. Added leather to the bottom and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. Added leather to the bottom and it's the best I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Shell 1972

customer_reviews.title: This is the best welding hood on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best welding hood on the market. The clarity can't be beat. My husband loves this hood. He said it makes his job much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: I can see clearly now - -WOW
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is a little spendy but boy do I like it. Top quality and optics are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Roger E.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for a daily welderman
customer_reviews.text: I like the lightness of the product. It came with 5 replacement lens and a bag to carry it in, all very nice. This is the perfect hood for constant use everyday, easy on the neck and great auto darkening!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome helmet! Didn't realize what I wasn't seeing until I got this helmet! Great gear! Great service! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Butch T.

customer_reviews.title: He says it's an awesome welding hood
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He says it's an awesome welding hood. Top of the line. He's very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Works Great !
customer_reviews.text: Welding hood is nice with the new technology in the lens ! The shipping was fast, the Hood was Boxed 2 times, no damage very pleased with the order overall 👍🏼👍🏼Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Truther

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: My husband said this was the best one he's ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet. Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: So much better than anything i have had before. Tig welder works down to 5 amps so had to upgrade
customer_reviews.author: hairy1xs

product_meta.title: Welding Helmet, Black, 3350 Series
product_meta.description: 'Welding Helmet, Auto-Darkening, Lens Shade 5 to 13, Not Rated Welding Helmet Light State, Viewing Area 3.74 In. x 3.34 In., Welding Helmet Color Black, Welding Helmet Material Nylon, Polycarbonate, 3350 Series, Grind Mode Yes, Electromagnetic Sensor No, Number of Arc Sensors 4, Switching Speed 1/25,000 sec., Graphics None, TIG AMP Rating 2A, Power Source Solar, Headgear Ratchet, ADF Controls Knobs, Battery Type Solar Cells, Features 4C(TM) Lens Technology, Optical Clarity, Wide Screen View'

Item: Welding Helmet TIG AMP Rating: 2A
ADF Controls: Knobs Number of Arc Sensors: 4 Color: Black Grind Mode: Yes Country of Origin (subject to change): China
